Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label a device that allows people to communicate over a distance using sound.
The student can illustrate the two students using the string telephone to communicate.
The student can depict the string telephone with two cups (or similar items) connected by a string.
The student can show an understanding that sound travels through the string by illustrating lines or arrows.
The student can demonstrate that the string must be tight for the device to work correctly.
The student can label the parts of the device (e.g., cups and string) in their drawing.
The student can include an explanation of how the device works using simple words or phrases.
